feature_model.name: Lens
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Lens (f_Lens) :m PSU (f_PSU) :m SBC (f_SBC) :m stcam (f_stcam) :m Trigger (f_Trigger) :m Camera (f_Camera) :m Display (f_Display) :o Firewire interface card (f_Firewire_interface_card) :o 3G (f_3G) :g [1, 1] : 3G via Ethernet (f_3G_via_Ethernet) : 3G via PCI104 (f_3G_via_PCI104) :o Ethernet switch (f_Ethernet_switch) :o Flasher (f_Flasher) :g [1, 1] : Wireless (f_Wireless) : Wired (f_Wired) :g [1, 1] : Tablet (f_Tablet) : VGA (f_VGA) :g [1, 1] : Piezzo (f_Piezzo) :m 25mm (f_25mm) : Laser (f_Laser) :m 75mm (f_75mm) : Radar (f_Radar) :m 50mm (f_50mm) :g [1, 1] : Firewire (f_Firewire) : GigE (f_GigE)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_Firewire or f_Firewire_interface_card constraint_2:~f_3G_via_Ethernet or f_Ethernet_switch constraint_3:~f_Tablet or f_Ethernet_switch
